spell1.name: SENTINEL STRIKE
spell1.description: Get up close to strike enemies. Landing the second hit enables a shield throw that can ricochet four times.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Automatically target enemies near the crosshair

spell2.name: FREEDOM CHARGE
spell2.description: Shield held high, carve a path forward, granting both himself and allies along the path continuous Bonus Health and Movement Boosts. Using Living Legend or Leading Dash while this ability is active can Launch Up enemies.

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: A spherical spell field with a 4m radius enveloping the caster, and a spell area with a width of 4m along the path

attributes.label: HEALTH RECOVERY
attributes.value: Cast to gain 150 Bonus Health and grant allies 100 Bonus Health. Every second afterward, gain 100 Bonus Health and grant allies 60 Bonus Health

attributes.label: MOVEMENT BOOST
attributes.value: Grant a 30% Movement Boost to both yourself and your allies

spell3.name: LEADING DASH
spell3.description: Boost speed and enable Fearless Leap to leap into the air.

spell4.name: VIBRANIUM ENERGY SAW
spell4.description: Hurl the energy-charged shield to strike enemies in a path.

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: Start at 70, with a 20% reduction for each ricochet

spell5.name: LIBERTY RUSH
spell5.description: Raise the shield and charge forward.

spell6.name: SUPER-SOLDIER SLAM
spell6.description: Slam down from the sky onto the targeted area, Launching Up enemies.

spell7.name: LIVING LEGEND
spell7.description: Raise the shield to deflect incoming projectiles, sending them ricocheting in random directions.
